Featuring Gartner Research
Market Guide for Mobile Application Testing
Thomas E. Murphy | Nick Jones | Joachim Herschmann
03 December 2014
Hi {{lead.First Name}},
In order to survive in today's market, companies need to stay competitive by developing applications at a rapid pace. This means that agile development teams must deal with faster product cycles and shorter time to market. As a result, companies are looking towards API testing and service virtualization to speed up process and are shifting testing to the left of their product cycle. By doing so, enterprises are able to provide complex business functionality, delivered at a faster pace with a quality that ensures a positive customer experience.
Testing complexity and costs can quickly escalate when breaking into the mobile market, a high degree of automation is required for success when developing mobile apps. Tricentis Tosca Testsuite provides cutting edge end-to-end testing solutions for mobile apps, cross-OS and cross-devices.
